creator: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml: The Smart Buddy programme allows parents to pre-set their child’s daily allowance and monitor spending/savings conveniently with this app. With the Smart Buddy watch, the child will be able to make payments at the school bookshop, canteen and selected merchants outside of school. The watch also doubles as a fitness tracker and you can view the child’s fitness activity in this app.
descriptionShort: Manage and view your child's spending/savings through Smart Buddy application.

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
+ Optimised the watch syncing process so you can sync faster
+ Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Have new ideas? Email us at posbsmartbuddy@dbs.com

title: POSB Smart Buddy

creator: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.

The watch also doubles as a fitness tracker and you can view the child’s fitness activity in this app.

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
+ Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Keep your child’s Smart Buddy updated by updating your child’s profile to ensure accurate fitness tracking and to receive relevant notifications.

We’re always here for you, reach out to us at posbsmartbuddy@dbs.com

title: POSB Smart Buddy

creator: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
POSB Smart Buddy is the world’s first in-school savings and payments wearable on your child’s wrist. It lets your child tap to pay in school and at selected merchants, check on balances, and track fitness levels.

You can instantly increase allowance, manage your child's finances and encourage smart living and saving habits. Most of all, you get to do them all while on the go.

Features:
· Set daily allowances

· Create savings goal

· Monitor spending/savings

· Link payment cards (i.e. Smart Buddy, School Smartcard, EZ-Link Card)

· Link Smart Buddy Watch for fitness tracking
descriptionShort: Manage and view your child's spending/savings through Smart Buddy application.

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Smart Buddy is now open to everyone! Cultivate the value of savings and thrift plus encourage smart living habits with Smart Buddy!
As a parent, get started by creating a child profile. You may even apply for a Smart Buddy card even if your child’s school is not onboard.

Other new features include:

· View School Smartcard/EZ-Link in-school transactions
· Link a Smart Buddy Watch (without any payment card)
· Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

The latest version contains minor fixes and performance improvements.

We’re constantly working to bring you updates that enrich your Smart Buddy experience in the coming new year.
In the meantime, have a Merry Christmas and a joyful new year!

descriptionShort: Manage and view your child's spending/savings through Smart Buddy application.

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for using the Smart Buddy App.
The latest update contains:

Enhancements to the newsfeed, allowing you to select, read all and share content easily.
The ability to delete child profile(s) that you do not need or if created erroneously.
Enabled real-time push notifications whenever your child spends on their registered card(s).
Added information icons and disclaimers to better explain app features and calculations.
Not to forget, minor fixes and performance improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are working hard to continuously deliver the best experience with the Smart Buddy App. The latest version includes enhanced services such as the ability to delete your Smart Buddy account, some fixes to the newsfeed and other updates.

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
As our children are working hard to prepare for their national year-end exams, so are we in working hard to ensure you have only the best experience with the Smart Buddy app.

The latest version includes UI enhancements to the child access dashboard and features, firmware upgrades and bug fixes when you sync your Smart Buddy watch to the app.

Thank you once again for your constant support and feedback to allow us to improve and better the app!

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Christmas is around the corner and while Santa’s elves are hard at work, so are we! This version includes new upgrades involving in-app ratings, some UI enhancements and a software upgrade to improve the stability of our mobile app. Thank you once again for your continued support and have a Merry Christmas ahead!

title: POSB Smart Buddy

creator: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
POSB Smart Buddy is the world’s first in-school savings and payments wearable on your child’s wrist. It lets your child tap to pay in school and at selected merchants, check on balances, and track fitness levels.

You can instantly increase allowance, manage your child's finances and encourage smart living and saving habits. Most of all, you get to do them all while on the go.

Features:
· Set daily or weekly allowances
· Create savings goal
· Monitor spending/savings
· Link payment cards (i.e. Smart Buddy, School Smartcard, EZ-Link Card)
· Link Smart Buddy Watch for fitness tracking
descriptionShort: Manage and view your child's spending/savings through Smart Buddy application.

appDetails.developerName: Network for Electronic Transfers (SG) Pte Ltd.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are thrilled to bring you an exciting new release of Smart Buddy:
1. Weekly Allowance Feature

2. Self-Service Watch Replacement: You can now submit watch replacement request via the app for faulty watches that are still within warranty period. Save the hassle and opt for delivery of new replacement watch directly to your house.

3. New Backup Email for parent profile to facilitate ease of account recovery

4. Minor fixes & UI upgrade
Stay tuned for more exciting updates coming your way soon!

title: POSB Smart Buddy
